select orderDetail.id orderDtlId, orderDetail.parent_id orderId,
round(ifnull(orderDetail.order_count, 0), 2) orderDtlCount, round(ifnull(orderDetail.product_sum, 0), 2) orderDtlSum,
round(ifnull(deliverOrderDtl.orderCount, 0), 2) orderDtlDeliverCount, round(ifnull(deliverOrderDtl.orderSum, 0), 2) orderDtlDeliverSum,
round(ifnull(retreatOrderDtl.orderCount, 0), 2) orderDtlRetreatCount, round(ifnull(retreatOrderDtl.orderSum, 0), 2) orderDtlRetreatSum,
round((ifnull(deliverOrderDtl.orderCount, 0) - ifnull(retreatOrderDtl.orderCount, 0)), 2) checkCount, round((ifnull(deliverOrderDtl.orderSum, 0) - ifnull(retreatOrderDtl.orderSum, 0)), 2) checkSum
from vmes_sale_order_detail orderDetail left join (
select order_detai_id orderDtlId, sum(order_count) orderCount, sum(sum) orderSum from vmes_sale_deliver_detail where state = '1' group by order_detai_id ) deliverOrderDtl on orderDetail.id = deliverOrderDtl.orderDtlId left join (
select order_detail_id, sum(order_count) orderCount, sum(order_sum) orderSum from vmes_sale_retreat_detail where state <> '-1' group by order_detail_id ) retreatOrderDtl on orderDetail.id = retreatOrderDtl.order_detail_id
and orderDetail.parent_id = #{orderId}
and orderDetail.parent_id in (${orderIds})

select deliverDtl.order_detai_id orderDetailId,
round(ifnull(orderDtl.order_count, 0), 2) orderCount, round(ifnull(orderDtl.need_deliver_count, 0), 2) needDeliverCount,
round(ifnull(deliverOrderDtl.orderCount, 0), 2) orderDtlDeliverCount, round(ifnull(deliverOrderDtl.orderSum, 0), 2) orderDtlDeliverSum,
round(ifnull(retreatOrderDtl.orderCount, 0), 2) orderDtlRetreatCount, round(ifnull(retreatOrderDtl.orderSum, 0), 2) orderDtlRetreatSum,
round((ifnull(deliverOrderDtl.orderCount, 0) - ifnull(retreatOrderDtl.orderCount, 0)), 2) checkCount,
round((ifnull(deliverOrderDtl.orderSum, 0) - ifnull(retreatOrderDtl.orderSum, 0)), 2) checkSum from ( select order_detai_id from vmes_sale_deliver_detail
and parent_id = #{deliverId}
group by order_detai_id ) deliverDtl left join (
select order_detai_id, sum(order_count) orderCount, sum(sum) orderSum from vmes_sale_deliver_detail
and order_detai_id = #{orderDtlId}
and order_detai_id in (${orderDtlIds})
and state = #{deliveDtlState}
group by order_detai_id ) deliverOrderDtl on deliverDtl.order_detai_id = deliverOrderDtl.order_detai_id left join (
select order_detail_id, sum(order_count) orderCount, sum(order_sum) orderSum from vmes_sale_retreat_detail
and order_detail_id = #{orderDtlId}
and order_detail_id in (${orderDtlIds})
and state = #{retreatDtlState}
group by order_detail_id ) retreatOrderDtl on deliverDtl.order_detai_id = retreatOrderDtl.order_detail_id
left join vmes_sale_order_detail orderDtl on deliverDtl.order_detai_id = orderDtl.id

select deliverDtl.orderDetailId, round(ifnull(orderDtl.product_count, 0), 2) productCount, round(ifnull(deliverOutDtl.deliverOutCount, 0), 2) deliverOutCount from ( select order_detai_id orderDetailId from vmes_sale_deliver_detail where out_detail_id is not null group by order_detai_id ) deliverDtl left join vmes_sale_order_detail orderDtl on deliverDtl.orderDetailId = orderDtl.id left join ( select deliverDetail.order_detai_id orderDetaiId, sum(outDetail.count) deliverOutCount from vmes_sale_deliver_detail deliverDetail left join vmes_warehouse_out_detail outDetail on deliverDetail.out_detail_id = outDetail.id where outDetail.state = '2' group by deliverDetail.order_detai_id ) deliverOutDtl on deliverDtl.orderDetailId = deliverOutDtl.orderDetaiId
and deliverDtl.orderDetailId = #{orderDetailId}
